Uses of Class
osyfe.graphic.Framebuffer.Config

  • Packages that use Framebuffer.Config 
    Package Description
    osyfe.graphic
    Manages graphical OpenGL objects.

    • Uses of Framebuffer.Config in osyfe.graphic

      Methods in osyfe.graphic that return Framebuffer.Config 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.alpha(boolean enable)
      Enables/disables the alpha channel (default: false).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.border_color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Specifies the border color.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.color_16_bits()
      Sets 16 bit resolution per color channel (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.color_32_bits()
      Sets 32 bit resolution per color channel.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.colors(int colors)
      Number of color components (default: 1).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.depth_16_bits()
      Sets 16 bit resolution for the depth channel.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.depth_32_bits_floating()
      Sets 32 bit floating resolution for the depth channel.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.depth_32_bits()
      Sets 32 bit resolution for the depth channel (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.depth(boolean depth)
      Enables/disables a sampleable depth buffer (default: true).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.filter_linear()
      Linear texture zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.height(int height)
      Height of the framebuffer (default: Screen.height()).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.mag_filter_linear()
      Linear texture in zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.mag_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture in zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.min_filter_linear()
      Linear texture out zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.min_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture out zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.screenSize()
      Set width and height of the framebuffer to the screen size (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.size(int width, int height)
      Width and height of the framebuffer (default: (Screen.width(), Screen.height())).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.width(int width)
      Width of the framebuffer (default: Screen.width()).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_clamp_to_border()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the specified border color.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_clamp_to_border(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the specified border color.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_clamp_to_edge()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_clamp_to_edge(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_mirrored_reapeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated mirrored.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_mirrored_reapeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated mirrored.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_repeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated.
      Framebuffer.Config Framebuffer.Config.wrap_repeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated.
      Constructors in osyfe.graphic with parameters of type Framebuffer.Config 
      Constructor and Description
      Framebuffer(Framebuffer.Config config)
      Creates a new framebuffer with the given size, an optional depth components and the given number of color components.
